sentences.en: Alright , I read your report Anything to add to this?
sentences.cn: 你对你的报告还有什么补充的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Alright, we'll fit as many people as we can!
sentences.cn: 好了, 我们会尽可能多的多带些人!

sentences.en: Alright. But we're not going to see another tragedy.
sentences.cn: 好, 但是我们可别看悲剧电影.

sentences.en: Are the young soon becoming alright after the medication is over?
sentences.cn: 那年青人是不是药力散了就没问题?

sentences.en: Are they going to be alright?
Are you getting on alright with your project?
I ran with the brother to keep my ass safe , alright man?
sentences.cn: 我跟他称兄道弟是为了保住自己明白么伙计?

sentences.en: If I get a penny from him, it'll be alright.
sentences.cn: 如果他给我一分钱,算是他买的鞋, 就没事了.

sentences.en: It's a little steep. But I'm sure it will be alright.
sentences.cn: 有点陡峭, 但我想应该没什么问题.

sentences.en: That's alright. You're a lot of help.
sentences.cn: 没关系. 你帮了很大的忙.

sentences.en: They encore with a superlative version of The Who's "The Kids Are Alright".
sentences.cn: 他们加演了谁人乐队的《真是不赖的小伙子》，非常精彩。

sentences.en: Would this science - fiction movie be alright?

sentences.cn: 你似乎很烦恼. 一切可好?
